## BootstrapTooltipDirective.trigger property

Bootstrap tooltip trigger (click \| hover \| focus \| manual) How tooltip is triggered. You may pass multiple triggers; separate them with a space. Manual cannot be combined with any other trigger.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
trigger: BootstrapTrigger;
```
